tldr: Due to improper handling of batch files in `child_process.spawn` / `child_process.spawnSync`, a malicious command line argument can inject arbitrary commands and achieve code execution, even if the shell option is not enabled.
doest_this_affect_me: This vulnerability affects all users in active release lines: 18.x, 20.x, 21.x but it is only exploitable on Windows.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `node` library to a patch version.
